name: SARS-CoV-2 vaccine effectiveness assessment (synthetic dataset 10k)

creator.affiliation: Instute for Health Science in Aragon (IACS)
creator.name: Enrique Bernal-Delgado

creator.affiliation: Instute for Health Science in Aragon (IACS)
creator.name: Francisco Estupiñán-Romero

creator.affiliation: Instute for Health Science in Aragon (IACS)
creator.name: Javier González-Galindo

description: Synthetic data set to test the causal model proposed by the baseline use case in BY-COVID WP5 assessing the effectiveness of the SARS-CoV-2 vaccine (10k registries and 650k registries)

variableMeasured.name: person_id
variableMeasured.description: Pseudoid  of the person included in the cohort

variableMeasured.name: age_nm
variableMeasured.description: Age of the person included in  the cohort (at the time of entering the cohort)

variableMeasured.name: sex_cd
variableMeasured.description: Sex of the person included in  the cohort (at the time of entering the cohort)

variableMeasured.name: socecon_lvl_cd
variableMeasured.description: Socioeconomic level of the person in the cohort (at the time  of entering the cohort)

variableMeasured.name: residence_area_cd
variableMeasured.description: Area of residence of the person included in the cohort (NUTS  3) (at the time of entering the cohort)

variableMeasured.name: country_cd
variableMeasured.description: Country of residence of the person included in the cohort (at  the time of entering the cohort)

variableMeasured.name: foreign_bl
variableMeasured.description: Is the country of residence different from the country that is  doing the analyses?

variableMeasured.name: exitus_dt
variableMeasured.description: Date of death of the person (if the person has died)

variableMeasured.name: exitus_bl
variableMeasured.description: Date of death of the person (if the person has died during the  period of study)

variableMeasured.name: essential_worker_bl
variableMeasured.description: Is the person included in the cohort an essential worker? (at  the time of entering the cohort)

variableMeasured.name: institutionalized_bl
variableMeasured.description: Is the person included in the cohort institutionalized? (at  the time of entering the cohort)

variableMeasured.name: dose_1_brand_cd
variableMeasured.description: Brand of first dose of the vaccine

variableMeasured.name: dose_1_dt
variableMeasured.description: Date of the first dose of the vaccine

variableMeasured.name: dose_2_brand_cd
variableMeasured.description: Brand of second dose of the vaccine

variableMeasured.name: dose_2_dt
variableMeasured.description: Date of the second dose of the vaccine

variableMeasured.name: dose_3_brand_cd
variableMeasured.description: Brand of third dose of the vaccine

variableMeasured.name: dose_3_dt
variableMeasured.description: Date of the third dose of the vaccine

variableMeasured.name: number_doses
variableMeasured.description: Number of doses (independently of the vaccine brand) received  by a person during the period of study

variableMeasured.name: fully_vaccinated_dt
variableMeasured.description: Date on which the person included in the cohort is considered  fully vaccinated

variableMeasured.name: fully_vaccinated_bl
variableMeasured.description: Is the person included in the cohort fully vaccinated?

variableMeasured.name: vaccination_schedule_cd
variableMeasured.description: Vaccine types received for 1st and 2nd dose concatenated with  hyphen

variableMeasured.name: confirmed_case_dt
variableMeasured.description: Date of diagnosis or date of test result positive of any known/confirmed infection after 2021-01-01 (SARS-CoV-2 vaccine roll-out) for non-vaccinated or after the person is considered fully vaccinated (see 'fully_vaccinated_dt') if vaccinated

variableMeasured.name: confirmed_case_bl
variableMeasured.description: Is the person included in the cohort a confirmed COVID-19  case?

variableMeasured.name: previous_infection_dt
variableMeasured.description: If the person experienced a confirmed infection before 2021-01-01 (SARS-CoV-2 vaccine roll-out) or before being considered fully vaccinated (see 'fully_vaccinated_dt')

variableMeasured.name: previous_infection_bl
variableMeasured.description: Did the person experience a confirmed infection proceeding the  last confirmed infection?

variableMeasured.name: test_type_cd
variableMeasured.description: Type of COVID-19 test used to detect the last known SARS-CoV-2  infection (i.e. first positive test for SARS-CoV-2)

variableMeasured.name: variant_cd
variableMeasured.description: Identified variant (WHO label) for last known SARS-CoV-2  infection

variableMeasured.name: diabetes_bl
variableMeasured.description: Does the person included in the cohort suffer from type II  diabetes (at the time of entering the cohort)?

variableMeasured.name: obesity_bl
variableMeasured.description: Does the person included in the cohort suffer from obesity (at  the time of entering the cohort)?

variableMeasured.name: heart_failure_bl
variableMeasured.description: Does the person included in the cohort suffer from heart  failure (at the time of entering the cohort)?

variableMeasured.name: copd_bl
variableMeasured.description: Does the person included in the cohort suffer from chronic  lung disease (at the time of entering the cohort)?

variableMeasured.name: solid_tumor_without_metastasis_bl
variableMeasured.description: Does the person included in the cohort suffer from solid  cancer without metastatis (at the time of entering the cohort)?

variableMeasured.name: chronic_kidney_disease_bl
variableMeasured.description: Does the person included in the cohort suffer from chronic  kidney disease (at the time of entering the cohort)?

variableMeasured.name: sickle_cell_disease_bl
variableMeasured.description: Does the person included in the cohort suffer from sickle cell  disease (at the time of entering the cohort)?

variableMeasured.name: hypertension_bl
variableMeasured.description: Does the person included in the cohort suffer from  hypertension (at the time of entering the cohort)?

variableMeasured.name: chronic_liver_disease_bl
variableMeasured.description: Does the person included in the cohort suffer from chronic liver disease (at the time of entering the cohort)?

variableMeasured.name: blood_cancer_bl
variableMeasured.description: Does the person included in the cohort suffer from blood  cancer (leukemia) (at the time of entering the cohort)?

variableMeasured.name: transplanted_bl
variableMeasured.description: Is the person included in the cohort a transplant patient  (i.e. solid organ transplantation) (at the time of entering the cohort)?

variableMeasured.name: hiv_infection_bl
variableMeasured.description: Does the person included in the cohort suffer from a HIV  infection (at the time of entering the cohort)?

variableMeasured.name: primary_immunodeficiency_bl
variableMeasured.description: Does the person included in the cohort suffer from a primary  immuno deficiency disease (lymphoma) (at the time of entering the cohort)?

variableMeasured.name: immunosuppression_bl
variableMeasured.description: Does the person included in the cohort suffer from drugs  induced immunosuppression (at the time of entering the cohort)?

variableMeasured.name: pregnancy_bl
variableMeasured.description: Is the person included in the cohort pregnant (at the time of  entering the cohort)?
